multiplechoiceresponse.label: What are the four scarce resources that any economic system must allocate between society's competing wants and needs?

choicegroup.choice: High skilled workers, low skilled workers, knowledge workers, and service sector workers
Land resources, labor, capital goods, and entrepreneurship
Forest, minerals, ocean, and energy resources
Information technology, physical capital, financial capital, and high skilled workers
Machines, technology, minerals, and energy resources
